# The `LoopVectorizationPlanner` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Planner drives the vectorization process after having passed Legality checks. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::LoopVectorizationPlanner</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Planner drives the vectorization process after having passed Legality checks.

Definition at line 357 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/loopvectorizationplanner-h">LoopVectorizationPlanner.h</a>.

Compute and return the most profitable vectorization factor.

Also collect all profitable VFs in ProfitableVFs.

### executePlan() {#acbe2feb9e960936a43c845a1fa8eaba4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt; const SCEV &#42;, Value &#42; &gt; LoopVectorizationPlanner::executePlan (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/elementcount">ElementCount</a> VF, unsigned UF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> &amp; BestPlan, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/innerloopvectorizer">InnerLoopVectorizer</a> &amp; LB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42; DT, bool VectorizingEpilogue, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; &#42; ExpandedSCEVs=nullptr)</>}>
Generate the IR code for the vectorized loop captured in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> <code>BestPlan</code> according to the best selected <code>VF</code> and <code>UF</code>.

TODO: <code>VectorizingEpilogue</code> indicates if the executed <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> is for the epilogue vector loop. It should be removed once the re-use issue has been fixed. <code>ExpandedSCEVs</code> is passed during execution of the plan for epilogue loop to re-use expansion results generated during main plan execution.

Returns a mapping of SCEVs to their expanded IR values. Note that this is a temporary workaround needed due to the current epilogue handling.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/loopvectorizationplanner-h/#l00452">452</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/loopvectorizationplanner-h">LoopVectorizationPlanner.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/loopvectorize-cpp/#l07639">7639</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/loopvectorize-cpp">LoopVectorize.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getPlanFor() {#a10f355c5a55dd7e98d31c2f7e0b590aa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>VPlan &amp; LoopVectorizationPlanner::getPlanFor (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/elementcount">ElementCount</a> VF) const</>}>
Return the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> for <code>VF</code>.

At the moment, there is always a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> for each VF.

<SectionDefinition>

## Protected Member Functions

### buildVPlans() {#a36d6728b8c3cfca0a9bd02c3f0273477}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LoopVectorizationPlanner::buildVPlans (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/elementcount">ElementCount</a> MinVF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/elementcount">ElementCount</a> MaxVF)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Build VPlans for power-of-2 VF&#39;s between <code>MinVF</code> and <code>MaxVF</code> inclusive, according to the information gathered by Legal when it checked if it is legal to vectorize the loop.

Build VPlans for the full range of feasible VF&#39;s = &#123;<code>MinVF</code>, 2 &#42; <code>MinVF</code>, 4 &#42; <code>MinVF</code>, ..., <code>MaxVF&#125;</code> by repeatedly building a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> for a sub-range of VF&#39;s starting at a given VF and extending it as much as possible.

Each vectorization decision can potentially shorten this sub-range during buildVPlan().

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/loopvectorizationplanner-h/#l00488">488</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/loopvectorizationplanner-h">LoopVectorizationPlanner.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-cpp/#l01624">1624</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-cpp">VPlan.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

### cost() {#ab6f45b1c4385eaec2d3ea11a0e03af10}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>InstructionCost LoopVectorizationPlanner::cost (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> &amp; Plan, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/elementcount">ElementCount</a> VF) const</>}>
Computes the cost of <code>Plan</code> for vectorization factor <code>VF</code>.

The current implementation requires access to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopvectorizationlegality">LoopVectorizationLegality</a> to handle inductions and reductions, which is why it is kept separate from the VPlan-only cost infrastructure.

TODO: Move to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan/#a8d2ce995a1feaa7a65ff40f77f073db3">VPlan::cost</a> once the use of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopvectorizationlegality">LoopVectorizationLegality</a> has been retired.

### tryToBuildVPlanWithVPRecipes() {#a88155f88d9b77ba6acc351bf80d23218}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>VPlanPtr LoopVectorizationPlanner::tryToBuildVPlanWithVPRecipes (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfrange">VFRange</a> &amp; Range)</>}>
Build a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> using VPRecipes according to the information gather by Legal.

This method is only used for the legacy inner loop vectorizer. <code>Range&#39;s</code> largest included VF is restricted to the maximum VF the returned <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> is valid for. If no <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> can be built for the input range, set the largest included VF to the maximum VF for which no plan could be built.

Return the value of applying <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/predicate">Predicate</a></code> on Range.Start, possibly decreasing Range.End such that the returned value holds for the entire <code>Range</code>.
